data.title: Careers in healthcare analytics: Join the LOGEX team
data.meta_description: LOGEX is looking for talented individuals to contribute to our mission of turning data into better healthcare.
data.text:
We are LOGEX

LOGEX transforms healthcare data into actionable insights to help decision-makers, regulators and clinicians optimise the healthcare they provide.

The right people make this all possible. That’s why we’re constantly on the lookout for brilliant minds from a wide range of expertise: medicine, mathematics, health economics, software development and more.

If you enjoy solving complex problems for the greater good, creating user-friendly solutions, and working in a dynamic, entrepreneurial culture, this is the company for you.

Driven by data, powered by people

Data is at the core of the solutions we offer, but people are at the heart of everything we do. Our team of over 400 international experts—managers, consultants, data scientists, analysts, and experts in technology, healthcare economics, medicine, mathematics and statistics—are valued for building long-term, mutually fulfilling partnerships with all our customers. We recognise that by investing in our people, we invest in our success.

At LOGEX, we don’t just handle our customers’ data; we become their trusted allies, offering unparalleled expertise, innovative perspectives, and fostering collaborative partnerships. Beyond delivering cutting-edge analytics solutions, our core values revolve around professionalism and a service-oriented mindset. At the heart of LOGEX lies a commitment to not just meet but exceed expectations, shaping a dynamic company culture driven by excellence and collaboration.

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

Our commitment to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DE&I) aligns with our core values, shaping the foundation of our workplace culture. We understand that the strength of our team lies in embracing diverse backgrounds, skills, and perspectives.

We view diversity not only as a source of vibrancy but as an ignition for innovation that transforms the healthcare analytics landscape.

We prioritise DE&I because we believe it’s more than just a goal—it’s a driver of excellence, enabling us to provide great service and build lasting partnerships with our global clientele.

Join us in a workplace where your uniqueness is celebrated, valued, and contributes to the impactful journey of shaping the future of healthcare. Explore our job openings and become part of a team where everyone’s voice matters.

Contact
